item.description:
Medieval fair at the castle!  Details here - http://www.abbadiamarefestival.com/index.html  Admission is $15

Parking is at Stage Fort Park with free shuttle bus service to the castle.  I think it will be best to gather at the parking area and ride to the castle together.  We can start with a tour and then wander around the festival.  I'll have more details as it gets closer...

Unfortunately the City Charges $15 for parking!! so I suggest some carpooling to save $!!

Please note there is no parking along Hesperus Avenue or the driveways of private homes.


Directions:

128 NORTH to Exit 14 rte 133.

Take right onto 133 North

Follow to the end where it meets rte 127

Take right and the quick left into Stage fort park.

128 NORTH to Exit 14, Rte 133.  Take a right onto 133 North
Follow to the end where it meets rte 127
Take a right and then a quick left into Stage Fort Park.
item.name: Renaissance Festival at Hammond Castle in Gloucester! Meet at parking area...
